Improved Initiative: +4 Initiative
Blind-Fight: Reroll concealed miss, no melee bonus to invisible foe, half penalty for impaired vision

Far Shot: x1.5 projectile range, x2 thrown
Improved Disarm: No AOO on Disarm, +4 attack
Improved Feint: Bluff check to Feint as move action
Improved Shield Bash: No AC penalty on Shield Bash
Improved Unarmed Strike: No AOO on Unarmed attack, may deal lethal damage
Improvised Weapon: No penalty for improvised weapon, -2 for non-proficient weapon
Point-Blank Shot: +1 ranged attack and damage w/in 30'
Quick: +1 attack w/light weapons
Tunnel Fighting: No penalty to AC or attack w/one-handed weapon when squeezing

Spells:
Bane (Shadowed1 Ench): Foes in 50' radius suffer -1 attack and fear saves for 20 min (DC 13 Will neg)
